entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 12:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: W 20 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
